title: Where am I?
body: My time totally got away from me today. In fact, I've been operating outside of the space-time continuum since about 7:32:44 in the ante meridiem. All posts have been delayed a day. Sorry. But before I go, I'd like to leave you with this: You know that part in the song Too Much by Dave Matthews and his band where he sings... I need more, I'm going over my borders, It's gonna take more More from you, less of Vanessa Do you think he's talking about Vanessa Huxtable? Think about it.
author: Dan

comments.author: whitty
comments.body:
I was just watching the Cosby Show today and thought, "Man, that Vanessa is a snappy dresser."

I need sleep. And less Cosby Show.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Funny thing is, Vanessa is a snappy dresser, and that's why Dave needs less of her.

comments.author: justin springer
comments.body: you can never get enough of the cosby show and those j-e-l-l-o pudding pops that mr cosby used to sell.also note of reference its "more from you letter by letter."

comments.author: james sheldon
comments.body:
Just wanted to say that I had one of hopefully many surreal encounters today, when I was called into an audition...showed up 45 minutes late after I had left for the destination 2 hours early (freeway accident=parking lot style traffic) to be told that I'd be reading for the producer and director, and I walked in the room and there sat the producer, Ms. Katy Wallin, a gem in this jaded business, and Tom Green.  Yes, my bum in on your face my bum is on your face, and the dude was so chill I didn't know what to say:  So instead of saying "nice to meet you," I say, "it's really good to see you..."  that goes over every time...anyway, f'n subcontractors.  I'm tellin' ya Dan, it's a midwestern thing.  You'd never get away with it elsewhere or someone else would have the job for a lower bid!!!  Hang in there buddy!  I can't wait to see a movie there when I'm back sometime this summer!

James

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Is Vanessa the one that spun off into a Different World?  All the siblings moved up a notch and they brought in Rudy.

Regardless, Duane Wayne is the BEST name for a dog EVER!

comments.author: steph v. horn
comments.body:
Uh, sorry to burst the bubble there, but it's

I need more, 
I'm going over my borders
I'm going to take more,
More from you, LETTER BY LETTER

comments.author: Dave
comments.body:
ah Tempest Bledsoe. one of the most underrated of the mediocre child sit-com actors of the 1980s.

by the way I got my t-shirt and pins and sticker. I put them all on, stood in the middle of a busy intersection and played air guitar for a good hour last night... but nobody honked for me.

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: hmm.. vanessa.. turned 32 today.. weird happy birthday vanessa i think i prefer lisa bonet she is super foxy btw.. i think you should show this movie

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: i keep forgetting to make it open in a new window... my bad

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Oh dude.  I totally didn't realize that was Vanessa Huxtable in that Chicago-ized Cusak-ized High Fidelity.  Cool.

comments.author: Cynde
comments.body: Dear Nate:  Lisa Bonet was in "hi-Fidelity" not Tempest Bledsoe.
